alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 5:43PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT LEON COUNTY THROUGH 615 PM EDT... At 543 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tallahassee Community College, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, Miccosukee, South City, Eight Mile Pond, Griffin Heights, Tallahassee Regional A/P, Governors Square Mall, Natural Bridge, Midtown, and Apalachee Ridge Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
